If the past is represented by -1 and the future by +1 then the present is 0 which defines both.
Yes it does, but it doesn’t mean 0 doesn’t exist

Certainly 0 exists but the nature of its existence is Nothingness. Truth comprises both "what is" (Being) and "what is not" (Nothingness).  If Nothingness is "what is not" then Being is "what is" hence creativity.
But we only used the numerical representation of past present and future to illustrate their place in relation to on another- not regarding to the nature of its existence.
Left/right, male/female, inside/outside, etc only exist because they are relationships none of which have a separate existence in and of themselves.
Does cause and effect exist if they are in a non-existent ‘place’ that is only a relationships not a thing in and of itself.

The two components of consciousness are observation (perceptual) and creativity (conceptual). In the case of animals and primitive species, the conceptual component is under-developed. It seems (per Karl Jasper) that arithmetic (via coinage) was the catalyst in Europe/Asia.

Once the perceptual/conceptual barrier was crossed, Europeans/Asians became their own creators and liberated themselves (mentaly) from natural evolution. Africans were isolated from this development by the Sahara desert.
